description:
**Fix Overview**:

To ensure that out-of-license instances of ScreenConnect can successfully install the required security update:

1. Refer to the release notes for the update, ensuring that you understand the specific bug fixes included.
2. Proceed to conduct the installation of the security update on your instances.

**Details**:
- This update does not introduce new features, it primarily focuses on bug fixes and is critical for keeping your instances secure. 
- Make sure to follow any additional instructions provided in the release notes to avoid issues during the installation.  (LLM Synthesized)
